question.text: The infertility in male due to very low sperm counts in the ejaculates or inability to inseminate the female partner,can be corrected by:

options.text: both <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> are used

solution.text: The infertility in male is due to very low sperm counts in the ejaculates or inability to inseminate the female partner, can be corrected byusing artificial insemination (AI) technique. This include intra-uterine insemination (IUI).
